verses.name: Galatians 4:1
verses.text: Now I say, That the heir, as long as he is a child, differeth nothing from a servant, though he be lord of all;

verses.name: Galatians 4:2
verses.text: But is under tutors and governors until the time appointed of the father.

verses.name: Galatians 4:3
verses.text: Even so we, when we were children, were in bondage under the elements of the world:

verses.name: Galatians 4:4
verses.text: But when the fulness of the time was come, God sent forth his Son, made of a woman, made under the law,

verses.name: Galatians 4:5
verses.text: To redeem them that were under the law, that we might receive the adoption of sons.
